body: I am creating a map, and I've written my YAML. It works great, but I wrote it in Notepad (windows application) and I can't figure out how to convert it to .yml. Any help would be appreciated.
body_tagged: I am creating a map, and I've written my YAML. It works great, but I wrote it in Notepad (windows application) and I can't figure out how to convert it to .yml. Any help would be appreciated.
title: .txt to .yml?

replies.body:
just give the .txt to the map devs, and they'll work it out for you, if the map is accepted.
(post the .txt file along with your world file in the map thread you will/already have made.)
Or copy/paste it into pastebin
replies.body_tagged:
just give the .txt to the map devs, and they'll work it out for you, if the map is accepted.
(post the .txt file along with your world file in the map thread you will/already have made.)
Or copy/paste it into pastebin

replies.body: use Nothepad++, its very good and it convert files
replies.body_tagged: use Nothepad++, its very good and it convert files

replies.body: Thank you! I've got it to work with Notepad++. A great program to have in general.
replies.body_tagged: Thank you! I've got it to work with Notepad++. A great program to have in general.
